title: SLO low - user experience vital lcp
description: SLO Burn rate on user experience performance

input.value:
fetch dt.entity.application
| filter in(tags,"slo_high:low") and not(in(tags,"slo_alert_perf:off"))
| fieldsAdd dt.rum.application.entity=id
| join [
   timeseries lcp=percentile(dt.frontend.web.page.largest_contentful_paint, 75, default:0)
  , by: { dt.rum.application.entity }
  //, interval: 5m
  //, filter: {matchesPhrase(entityAttr(ddt.rum.application.entity,"tags"),"slo")}
  ], on:{dt.rum.application.entity}, kind:leftOuter
| fields timeframe=right.timeframe, 
  interval=right.interval, 
  high=iCollectArray(if(right.lcp[]> (4000), right.lcp[])),
  low=iCollectArray(if(right.lcp[]<= (4000), right.lcp[])),
  dt.rum.application.entity,
  entityName(dt.rum.application.entity,type: "dt.entity.application")
| fieldsAdd 
  highRespTimes=iCollectArray(if(isNull(high[]),0,else:1)),
  lowRespTimes=iCollectArray(if(isNull(low[]),0,else:1))
| fieldsAdd sli=100*(lowRespTimes[]/(lowRespTimes[]+highRespTimes[]))

// ADD THIS SECTION TO CALCULATE THE BURN RATE for single service-entities
| fieldsAdd target = {{ .target_lowslo_userexperiencevitallcp }} //ADD the SLO target
| fieldsAdd burnRate = ((100 - sli[]) / (100 - target)) // BurnRate = Error Rate / Error Budget
| fieldsRemove sli, high, low, highRespTimes, lowRespTimes

properties.value: SLO Burn rate on user experience performance
